# Describing the current Stock assessment model {#modeldescription}
The latest published stock assessment [@goethel2021assessment] is a sexually disaggregated integrated age-structured model. Let $\bm{N}$. The process model follows Equation \@ref(eq:processmodel),

\begin{equation} 
  N_{a,s,y} = f\left(N_{a-1,s,y-1}\right) 
  (\#eq:processmodel)
\end{equation} 

See equation \@ref(eq:processmodel)
